markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Multilingual Cipher](/Feats.aspx?ID=1994) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 178 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Linguist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=64)

**Prerequisites**
[Linguist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1993); Expert in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)

</column>

---

You use multiple languages to create and break codes. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Decipher Writing](/Actions.aspx?ID=22). If another creature attempts to Decipher Writing you encoded, they take a –2 circumstance penalty unless they speak all the languages you used when you created the writing.
name: Multilingual Cipher
